cause.description:
Pulmonary hypertension (PH) is a simplified name for a complex health problem- continuous high blood pressure in the pulmonary artery in the lungs. The blood vessels constrict and the walls thicken so they cant carry as much blood. This resulting in an enlarged heart which can also lose its ability to pump.
1. There needs to be more support given to people suffering with PH
cause.mission: Raise Awarness of this rare disease
cause.name: Pulmonary Hypertension
